00001 //Filename   : OSYSMESS.CPP
00002 //Description: Sys class functions for processing window messages
00003 
00004 #include <OSYS.H>

00006 //-------- Begin of function Sys::main_win_proc --------//
00009 long Sys::main_win_proc(HWND hWnd, UINT message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) {
00010     switch( message ) {
00011     case WM_CREATE:
00012         main_hwnd = hWnd;
00013         break;
00014 
00015     case WM_ACTIVATEAPP:
00016         active_flag = (BOOL)wParam && !IsIconic(hWnd);
00017 
00018         //--------------------------------------------------------------//
00019         // while we were not-active something bad happened that caused us
00020         // to pause, like a surface restore failing or we got a palette
00021         // changed, now that we are active try to fix things
00022         //--------------------------------------------------------------//
00023 
00024         if( active_flag ) {
00025             unpause();
00026             redraw_all_flag = 1;                      // for Sys::disp_frame to redraw the screen
00027         }
00028         else
00029             pause();
00030         break;
00031 
00032     case WM_PAINT:
00033         redraw_all_flag = 1;
00034         break;
00035 
00036         //### begin zb 02/24/99
00037     case WM_CLOSE:                                // ALT+F4 ???
00038         //                      deinit_directx();
00039 
00040         //### fred      2904
00041         //main_hwnd = NULL;
00042         //PostQuitMessage( 0 );
00043         //### fred      2904
00044         //                      break;
00045         return 0;
00046 
00047     case WM_DESTROY:
00048         main_hwnd = NULL;
00049         //                       deinit_directx();
00050         PostQuitMessage( 0 );
00051         //                       break;
00052         return 0;
00053         //### end zb 02/24/99
00054 
00055     default:
00056         break;
00057     }
00058 
00059     return DefWindowProc(hWnd, message, wParam, lParam);
00060 }
00061
